activities.name: Copy Raw to Cleansed Sales Arancione

scriptLines: SourceCSVCeleste derive(FileName = concat(OnlineRetailer, '_', substring(SalesMonth, 1, 4), '_', substring(SalesMonth, 6, 2))) ~> addFileNameColumn

SourceCSVCeleste derive(FileName = concat(OnlineRetailer, '_', substring(SalesMonth, 1, 4), '_', substring(SalesMonth, 6, 2))) ~> addFileNameColumn
